page.title: 08Inside Dartmoor Prison
page.content: The area inside Dartmoor Prison,inside the main wall, is about 3 acres. The prison is divided up into 4 wings which are all occupied at the moment. There are approximately 750 prisoners but there are 200 prison officers to look after them. There are lots of activities for the prisoners to do.They can work on an outside working party or in one of the well- equipped workshops.There are lots of industries to choose from such as; the carpenter's shop where they make cabinets for hi-fi's; the textile shop where they make mail bags, mattress covers and laundry bags ; the metal fabrication shop where they make gates and window frames for other prisons and there are training courses in welding, electronic wiring,painting and decorating and plastering.The other prisoners work in the....cont'd
